Name: Tactical Realism
Description: Bring all charges, both clackers, you have to use all charges!

Name: Miami Vice
Description: You're 80's action heroes. Only NACK's and LS45's for you.

Name: Low Budget
Description: Bring only ONE bolt action rifle (or legros), everyone eles only takes pistols. If the rifle drops, it must be retrieved at all costs!

Name: Metal Gear
Description: Defenders must act as Metal Gear Solid guards and yell out "WHAT WAS THAT NOISE?" whenever hearing a noise, and get their own patrols around the map.

Name: John Wick
Description: Can only take pistols, and can only shoot with brace fire followed by ADS execution shot.

Name: Driveby
Description: Everyone brings pistols or NACK, one man takes the cart - everyone else must stack up on him. He drives, where he goes you go!

Name: Roman Testudo
Description: Two people take shields up front, and must stay next to each other. All other players must stay behind the shields

Name: Eye Protection
Description: No flashbangs allowed, need to protect the criminal's eyes! They're sensitive, after all.

Name: No Step Back
Description: One player is the commissar and only takes a pistol - all other players must obey their commands. If anyone disobeys, the commissar must execute them!

Name: Christmas
Description: Everyone gives each other a gun of their own choice. Hate someone on your team? Give them a terrible gun!

Name: Volley Fire
Description: Each player has to fire in order, once one player fires the next one in order fires. This happens until it loops

Name: Social Network
Description: Players can only move when a teammate is in line of sight. No exceptions!

Name: Ladies First
Description: You have to open doors for your buds, but you can't go in the room yourself until everyone else goes in

Name: Hide N' Seek
Description: Shoot out all the lights in bomb room and find a hiding spot. You stay there for the entire round

Name: Echolocation
Description: Players must shoot out all the lights in the room before they can shoot opponents.

Name: Dark Ages
Description: There is no light anymore! You're not allowed to use flares, and must turn off the lights at round start.

Name: Riot
Description: Every player must bring a molotov.

Name: Target Confirmation
Description: You must ask your teammates for permission before shooting an enemy, your teammates are allowed to deny your request if they wish.

Name: Field Of Barbs
Description: Every player must take a barbed wire, and place them around the bomb.

Name: CPR
Description: Whenever a teammate dies, drop everything else and immediately perform medical procedures on them. Save them!

Name: Great Barbs of Fire
Description: Players must take molotovs and barbed wire ONLY!

Name: Drill Sarge
Description: One player is your drill sargeant, and he must motivate his fellow teammates! When they do well, reward them - and if they mess up, punish them accordingly!

Name: Rave!
Description: Throw down your flares and pick them back up. Run at the attackers and show them your true colors!

Name: flash frenzy
Description: You must flash every room before you enter - if a room hasn't been flashed, you can't enter!

Name: Spinbotting???
Description: Set your sensitivity in game to 10 for everything. When you kill an enemy, look down and spin around.

Name: Just Like Training
Description: Whenever breach into a room, you have to check every single corner for an enemy - you can only move into the next room when you're 100% sure there are no enemies in the room.

Name: Open For Business!
Description: You're the C-Store manager and you just opened. Leave the shutters open, get in the teller room, the only weapon you can use is the one in teller Your team votes one player to be the janitor.

Name: Anarchy
Description: No talking, and no drawing on the map (apart from anarachy symbols).

Name: Open Ventilation
Description: Open all the doors, it's getting stuffy inside and you need some fresh air!

Name: Open For Delivery
Description: You are waiting on a shipment - open all the docks!

Name: CQB
Description: You can only use shotguns and NACKs.

Name: Cleanup Crew
Description: Only one player can bring a weapon. He has to get all the kills, the rest of the team picks up weapons from enemies he killed

Name: Recycling
Description: Whenever someone dies, you have to pick up their weapons and throw it into a pile you've designated somewhere in the map

Name: Crab
Description: One player takes a shield, but can't raise it - all other players can only strafe.

Name: Ear Safety
Description: You can only fire suppressed shots.

Name: Kobe
Description: You can only throw nades through small holes. If you miss, you can't push in with the nade - wait it out.

Name: Recruit Run
Description: Have everyone bring barb wire. One player is your leader, he can play normally, however his teammates, the recruits, must crawl through the field of wire.

Name: Splinter Cell
Description: Night vision must be turned on at all times.

Name: Silent Assassins
Description: You can only use guns if they have suppressors on them, if there are none left, you may not use a gun.

Name: Freeze
Description: Any time an enemy dies all players must freeze in place and cant move for 5 seconds

Name: Other Head Meta
Description: You can only shoot at people's crotch.

Name: Hold Formation
Description: Team must hold the formation of 3 in front, and 2 in back. The center front of the formation is the commander - if they die, remaining players must scatter!

Name: Tacticool
Description: You're the most tacticool enforcers out there. Brace firing only, speak extrmely tactically. Everytime someone dies, say Tango Down! When reloading loudly shout it to all teammates, when grenades go out, you mast say FRAG OUT as loudly as possible, as well as supppressing fire whenever shooting

Name: Gladiator
Description: Only one attacker can enter the building at a time. Once they die, the next may enter.

Name: Did We Bring The Map?
Description: You fucked up, you forgot your map. You can't look at the map at all any time in the game, you go in completely blind

Name: Gun Roulette
Description: You must close your eyes, spin around, and then randomly select a weapon.

Name: Cold Drinks
Description: If you are last player standing, you must leave the building and go to the nearest background vending machine - stay there for 5 seconds! Then, you may return to the building.

Name: Handicapped
Description: Teammates shoot each other until they're low on health, and then continue the round as normal

Name: No legs
Description: Place your puck in the map, once you spawn in, YOU MAY NOT MOVE.

Name: Duck Hunt
Description: All defenders can only take shotguns.

Name: Fire Shield
Description: Team must hold as many fire extinguishers as possible - you can't drop them, until an enemy shoots it!

Name: Comms "Issues"
Description: Everytime you hear someone speak, talk over them, never let anyone talk. No planning allowed.

Name: Radio Discipline
Description: Every time you finish talking, you must end with the phrase "Over".

Name: Around The World
Description: You must open, and have a teammate enter from every exterior door.

Name: Just like Siege, right?
Description: Have players run out side and move around the building to avoid the drone, attempting to get to the attacker truck. You have to go one at a time. After all, you're playing siege, gotta spawn-peek, right?

Name: Breach N' Clear
Description: Get your team to stack up on every entrance to the bomb room, if you don't have one player on every entrance, you cant go inside the bomb room.

Name: RC ARGUS
Description: One players enters at a time, and must obey orders from their teammates who are watching in map view.

Name: The Scenic Route
Description: You must take the longest route to the bomb!

Name: Cluster
Description: Form one big cluster! You can only move when touching each other.

Name: Bagel Fire,
Description: Set up fire extinguishers to every entrance to the bomb room, once the doors open shoot all the fire extinguishers. You gotta keep the fire away!

Name: Vape Hotbox
Description: Take all your smokes, and when you get to the bomb room, spam smoke grenades everywhere, and run in for the defuse

Name: Dropshot
Description: Constantly spam crouch no matter what. As soon as you start shooting, stay crouched.

Name: Rage Quit
Description: Everyone hits Alt+F4, and tries to reconnect as quickly as possible. The player who gets in first has to try and win the game, while everyone waits for the next round to start before reconnecting

Name: Clutch Or Kick
Description: One man has to go in and ace the team. If he loses the round the team can only use super shotties and LS45's next round

Name: New Player Speech
Description: Everyone must give their "new player" speech, explain how to play, and outline the features of DP before they can play.

Name: Why would you delete the penis?
Description: You can play normally. Except all you drawing has to include some sort of penis

Name: An Unlikely Pairing
Description: Use the legros and LS45 for the least chance of kills.

Name: Prime Suspect
Description: One player teamkills another player. Everyone else must discuss why he should be banned for the rest of the round!

Name: Firing Squad
Description: Open the shutters, all players line up along the shutters and shoot the attackers as they run by.

Name: Try a Bit Harder
Description: Stand up for the round, you need to show everyone your true power!

Name: Beat Cops
Description: PK-57's only, the only time you can use a primary is if it's a shotgun, but you may only use one round and it must be shot at an outside green door. Only flashbangs are allowed for grenades.

Name: I heard you liked flash bangs
Description: Only flashbangs are allowed as equipment - one player stays in the van and drops all the flashbangs. All flashes must be used!

Name: Trigger Discipline
Description: You need to wait for a target to shoot at you before taking any shots at them, what if there isn't intent to kill?

Name: Scav Run
Description: you can only use the Legros and TUB-12 and must always aim for the legs

Name: Training
Description: One player is the teacher and must stay in the van. Yell at any player who does something wrong!

Name: The Curious Mind Of Alex Baard
Description: Go up to a red door, open it, spawnpeek attackers. You can't close it at all, and you have to loudly shout "Fuck!" when you die.

Name: Ultimate Power!
Description: Take all the remaining barb wire, power weapons, and molotovs. Everyone go to one door, throw down the wire, have two people prep molotovs, and point all power weapons at the door.

Name: Hostage Negotiator
Description: You send in one player with just a pistol to try and negotiate peace - if goes wrong, it's time to breach!

Name: Be polite
Description: You must close every door you open after you enter.

Name: I Have The High Ground!
Description: Find the highest point achievable in the map, and have the entire team sit there.

Name: The Commisar Play
Description: Choose one player to target at the beginning of the match. You have to get a kill on that player every round, and if someone else kills them - show them how disappointed you are by teamkilling them!

Name: Pictionary
Description: Screw planning, just play pictionary until round start!

Name: Red Light, Green Light!
Description: Have one player become the traffic light. You can only move when they say green light, and must stop when they say red light!

Name: Silence
Description: No voice communication (through in-game or Discord) throughout the round.

Name: Christmas Truce
Description: Convince the other team to lay down their weapons and have a truce for the round. No fighting - only singing Jingle Bells.

Name: Christmas Tr-Sike!
Description: Convince the other team to lay down their weapons and have a truce for the round. No fighting - only singing Jingle Bells. Until you reveal you had weapons all along. Murder their entire team as quickly as possible!

Name: On Strike
Description: You are on strike refuse to fight unless you have to defend your self

Name: Advisory!
Description: One player is the manager, you have to file a request through him before taking any actions, if you don't you have to run outside and get shot by the drone

Name: Musketmen
Description: Everyone has to stand in a line to fire, synchronized. Commanding Officer calls when to "Fire!"

Name: The Three Musketeers
Description: Have your team grab all the Legros' available. You can't grab any other weapons, if a person with a legros dies, you can pick up their weapon

Name: Paranoia
Description: Trust no-one, not even your team-mates, anyone that you see once you get in the map is an enemy. Kill on Sight

Name: No backup
Description: you must shoot out all the emercency lights on the map

Name: Physical Power
Description: Door kick kills only. Good luck buddy.

Name: Cheeky Peek
Description: Enemies can only be killed if they run in front of the front windows, and doors. Once inside, no murder allowed

Name: Bathroom Boys
Description: All defenders hide in bathroom stalls and wait for the attackers

Name: No memes
Description: play properly for once in your life

Name: Explosion One Way Or Another
Description: You can't defuse the bomb. You have to kill everyone to win.

Name: Deagle only
Description: can only bring an LS45

Name: One Shot-One Kill
Description: Take all mags for all weapons and mag dump until there is only one shot in each mag. If grabbing a shotgun or mawp, only one bullet allowed

Name: COD Kid
Description: Reload immediately after you get a kill

Name: Rookie Mistake
Description: Breach through a green door using a door charge (take two clackers for extra points)

Name: Rookie Mistake: 2 Electric Boogaloo
Description: Accidentally teamkill your teammate

Name: Forgetful
Description: dont reaload your gun untill you see an enemy

Name: Reload: Insurgency Sandstorm Edition
Description: Don't pick up any reloaded magazines

Name: Butterfingers
Description: Your gun is slippery and recoil is a bitch! Drop your weapon after every kill (you can pick it back up)

Name: Rookie Mistake 3: Revenge Of The Defenders
Description: Grab flashbangs from attacker bodies and use them on them next round.

Name: Beep
Description: you must beep 3 times after every kill or death

Name: Beep 2
Description: all nouns are now beeps

Name: Philosophical
Description: After every kill you get, think of a quote that you would see on Jaden Smith's twitter

Name: Xbox Gamer
Description: Everyone has to deepthroat their mic for the round. Or set the gain to max. Or both

Name: Salt
Description: you must become extreamly saltly at who ever kills you and cry and swear about them till the end of the round (bonus points for hackusations)

Name: Deaf
Description: Mute your computer for the round.

Name: Blind
Description: Turn off your monitor for the round.

Name: Full Cycle
Description: After every kill you must reload untill you get back to the mag you got a kill with once you get back to it you can reload a new mag

Name: Let the bodies hit the floor
Description: Have four people run in and get themselves killed, last guy mutes his game. They have to use the sounds they hear to tell the last guy what's happening in game

Name: Command Under Darkness
Description: Shoot out backup lights and turn off power, one guy uses the map to guide teammates throughout the map

Name: Look Ma, No Hands or Feet
Description: Doors can only be opened with a shotgun, no kicks or opening regularly

Name: Party Time
Description: Everyone has to defend the club.

Name: Gin? Fuck Gin!
Description: You must shoot out all the drinks in the club bar, before defusing

Name: The Hunter
Description: Run into the map with a shield until you find a defender. Once you do, try and lure them outside

Name: Toxic Playerbase
Description: you must play only in toxic or vats. And shit-talk before and after every kill

Name: Bad Devs
Description: Complain about every little thing and only blame the devs until end of round

Name: Campers!!!
Description: Choose a spot at the beginning of the round and do not move from it.

Name: No walking
Description: You cannot press your walk key (default: CTRL)

Name: Hot Floor
Description: Once inside the building, you must constantly be jumping. The floor is hot!!

Name: Due Process: The Musical
Description: Each player picks a random song from disney and sings it over each other the entire round,

Name: Rush B
Description: You can't stop moving and must take and AP-25 only doing mag dumps

Name: Hot Potato
Description: Your team is allowed one primary weapon total, you can only hold it for 15 seconds until you have to drop it

Name: The power of sharing
Description: Only bring one pirmary weapon after every kill it must be droped and picked up by a teammate

Name: The floor is lava
Description: Defenders cannot touch the floor once the execution phase begins

Name: No Two are Alike
Description: Every one brings a different primary weapon

Name: The FitnessGram Pacer test
Description: Do a lap around the map before breaching

Name: Charisma
Description: Go up to a red door without any charges and attempt to convince the enemy to open the red door for you.

Name: Ambiance
Description: Everyone picks a different song to play over the mic to create epic ambiance

Name: You're The DJ!
Description: One person is the DJ in Club, everyone else has to rave to the music he is playing through his mic... even once the round has started. Convince the other team to join in

Name: Protectors Of The Weak!
Description: No guns are allowed, have two players bring shields, and have everyone else bring flashes and smokes. The shield players must protect the grenade players until they can reach the bomb room and ninja defuse

Name: Party Chat
Description: Ping the enemy team on discord and try to get them in to a voice channel with your team for atleast the round

Name: Snitch
Description: Tell the other team your plan in text chat; no bluffing

Name: Moving Day
Description: Everyone has to hide in the truck at Docks

Name: State Approved Books
Description: One player must begin reading from the book cloest to them and not stop untill the end of the round

Name: Nostalgia
Description: All callouts, and planning must be commmunicated via movie quotes. No drawing allowed

Name: Get Down Mister President!
Description: Select one person as the VIP, everyone else must protect them at all costs.

Name: Follow the leader
Description: All attackers must move in a line, following the person in front. If they die the next person must lead the line

Name: Locked N' Loaded
Description: you must stare at your target for 5 consecutive seconds before shooting them

Name: Flank And Gank
Description: Your team must only take Nack's, Super Shotguns, And Tub-12's. You then all need to find a hiding spot in a room to flank attackers from. The name of the game here is flanking, you'll need to get the jump on your enemies to win

Name: Ambush
Description: you can only shoot your targets in the back or wallbang them

Name: Autoshotgun is OP
Description: Waste all of the ammo in the autoshotgun - and therefore do not use it for the rest of the period

Name: Cart Clean-up
Description: Have the cart watch an open exterior door

Name: FaZe Clan
Description: Trickshots only

Name: All Hail The Sab-R
Description: One player brings the Sab-R, everyone else brings PK-57's with only one mag loaded. The PK players must protect the SAB-R holder at all costs. If they die, everyone else drops their weapons and dips their heads in shame

Name: Depression
Description: Just tell the team you don't really feel like playing today in the game chat. And then throw the round completely.

Name: Meat Grinder
Description: Have everyone on your team but one person sit in kitchen, the last one can go where ever they want. The rest of your team must kill one ARGUS enforcer in the kitchen before leaving, they'll then have to run to the teammate who's outside and serve him their dish before going anywhere else

Name: It's just a prank bro!
Description: As soon as you spot any defender, immediately drop your weapon on the ground, go into text chat and insist that they're on a prank show, convince them to drop their weapons

Name: Rookie Mistake 4: A New Hope
Description: Take all the remaining barb wire in your stash, plant it only at red doors and docks or shutters if you're on factory/cstore.

Name: Keepin' It PG
Description: No swearing for the entire round, if someone swears, kill them, or have them commit suicide

Name: I got the power!
Description: Put all power weapons in a corner of the map of your choice. No-one can take a primary. Once the power weapons are in a corner of the map, play the round normally. If you get a kill you're allowed to pick up one power weapon

Name: 45 Degrees
Description: Constantly sprint no matter what. If you want to fire at an enemy, you'l need to turn to your right and angle your gun toward them. No grenades either

Name: Trickster
Description: Call out where ever your team is going, but bluff constantly. You cannot tell the enemy where your team is actually breaching

Name: Territorial Animals
Description: Find one room in the map and claim it as your territory. No-one else is allowed to come into your territory, or they'll get killed. If you kill anyone, including team-mates, you must go up to their body and feast on their carcass, crouching over it for three seconds. If someone dies, their territory is now open to everyone

Name: Hunters: In the wild
Description: Only SABR'S and BLK-TAR's are allowed. Once you get into the match, act as if this is a National Geographic nature documentary. The defenders are now an animal of your choice. And you must call them that for the rest of the round

Name: ENEMY SPOTTED!
Description: You can only take PK-57's and frag grenades, as soon as you see a target you must pull the pin on your frag and run up to them. If you only have a PK you may only hip fire your target, in addition to this, once you've found your target, you can't use A, S, and D

Name: Role Reversal?
Description: Have two players take a SAB-R and a BLK-TAR each. Everyone else grab shotguns, wall charge the C-Store shutters, (or door charge if you're out of wall charges) The SAB-R and BLK-TAR players must rush in as quickly as possible. Shotgun players stay outside looking in from the shutter peekhole and attempt to snipe

Name: Death From Above!
Description: Grab all smoke grenades in the truck and chuck them onto the roof of the building to the best of your ability. They'll never see it coming

Name: Wait... Wrong building.
Description: Find one of the background buildings and run towards it. Once you've gone to that building, realize it isn't the playable factory and run toward the actual objective

Name: Mister Freeze
Description: Stay in the freezer room, and talk like mister freeze for the rest of the round.

Name: Brace Yourself
Description: Only Brace firing for the rest of the round. This is for all weapons, including the SAB-R and MAWP

Name: Preperation
Description: One player is your squad leader. Before anyone shoots, he must say ready, aim, fire! When ready is said you must stop, and you have to obey all of these commands even if you don't see an enemy

Name: Expert Defuser
Description: One player is the expert defuser and can only carry a pistol.They are the only one that can defuse the bomb, everyone elses must protect them

Name: This isn't Glaz
Description: Stand in front of a door and throw a smoke grenade into it. Then shoot blindly through the smoke with the SAB-R, no matter who goes in front of your gunfire

Name: Follow the plan
Description: Before the round starts you must create a complete plan to reach the bomb. You cannot deviate from this plan once you leave the truck

Name: Murder Of Innocents
Description: After every kill, your team has to close their eyes for five seconds straight

Name: Delivery
Description: Use all remaining charges to breach as many docks as possible

Name: Wall O' Wire
Description: Barb wire functions as a literal wall, you can't go through it. You need to move around it.

Name: Door Stuck!
Description: You may only go through normal green doors. You can't go through teller doors, bathroom doors, freezer doors, or any other unique door. Only the normal green door.

Name: Deadly Aresenal
Description: You may only take the MAWP, Shopping Cart, Auto Shotgun, and Ingmar's for primary weapons

Name: Double Trouble
Description: Roll two strats this round, you have to adhere to the rules set by them to the best of your ability

Name: Total Commitment
Description: Use all available utility/equipment in one room only.

Name: 100% Coverage
Description: Kick every single door in the level before attempting to defuse the bomb.

Name: Follow the plan (hard mode)
Description: You and your team must follow lines that are drawn to the T. No deviation even in the face of danger.

Name: Do it Live
Description: Make a complete plan during setup+prep. Once execution starts, abandon the plan and attempt to make a new plan during execution.

Name: Diggity
Description: Replace Every callout you make with diggity

Name: Budget Audio
Description: Every single sound in the game must be voiced over by you, even walking

Name: Sugar Rush
Description: For the entire round talk as if you're an insane youtuber. Shout constantly and make every callout clickbaity
